videos.description: Greg Huegel 47 yd FG MISSED
videos.headline: G. Huegel 47 yd FG MISSED

videos.description: Mitch Trubisky pass complete to Mack Hollins for 16 yds to the Clem 24 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: M. Trubisky pass,to M. Hollins for 16 yds for a 1ST down

videos.description: Nick Weiler 30 yd FG GOOD
videos.headline: N. Weiler 30 yd FG GOOD

videos.description: Clemson's Deshaun Watson showes off the arm, going deep to Artavis Scott for a 42-yard pick up. Clemson finishes the drive with a touchdown to take a 7-3 lead.
videos.headline: Clemson going deep to set up go-ahead TD

videos.description: Deshaun Watson finds Wayne Gallman who walks in for a 16-yard touchdown and Clemson takes a 7-3 lead.
videos.headline: Clemson on the board

videos.description: Andy Teasdall punt for 35 yds, fair catch by Ryan Switzer at the Clem 45
videos.headline: A. Teasdall punt for 35 yds, fair catch by R. Switzer

videos.description: Marquise Williams buys time and finds T.J. Logan, who completes the 46-yard score, his first touchdown of the season.
videos.headline: Williams gets loose, UNC takes the lead

videos.description: Andy Teasdall punt for 48 yds , Ryan Switzer returns for 29 yds to the Clem 40
videos.headline: A. Teasdall punt for 48 yds,R. Switzer returns for 29 yds

videos.description: Joey Mangili punt for 43 yds, downed at the Clem 4
videos.headline: J. Mangili punt for 43 yds, downed

videos.description: Deshaun Watson run for 33 yds to the NCaro 44 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: D. Watson run for 33 yds for a 1ST down

videos.description: Deshaun Watson pass complete to Deon Cain for 8 yds to the NCaro 30 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: D. Watson pass,to D. Cain for 8 yds for a 1ST down

videos.description: Deshaun Watson finds space on a designed run into the end zone from nine yards out giving Clemson back the lead at 14-9.
videos.headline: Watson puts Clemson back in front with 9-yard TD run

videos.description: TEAM run for a loss of 3 yards to the Clem 49 TEAM fumbled, recovered by Clem Deshaun Watson
videos.headline: TEAM run for -3 yds,TEAM fumbled, recovered by Clem D. Watson

videos.description: Clemson punter Andy Teasdall takes off running on a fake punt, but came up short. UNC's subsequent drive leads to a touchdown. Dabo Swinney goes off on the punter.
videos.headline: Dabo fired up after fake punt

videos.description: Marquise Williams pass complete to Ryan Switzer for 3 yds for a TD
videos.headline: M. Williams pass,to R. Switzer for 3 yds for a TD

videos.description: Teasdall, Andy punt 37 yards to the UNC31, fair catch by Switzer, Ryan, PENALTY CLEMSON personal foul (Green, T.J.) off-setting, PENALTY UNC Illegal Block off-setting, NO PLAY.
videos.headline: NORTH CAROLINA penalty, Personal Foul (T. Green)

videos.description: Marquise Williams sacked by Kevin Dodd for a loss of 6 yards to the NCaro 32
videos.headline: M. Williams sacked by K. Dodd for -6 yds

videos.description: Deshaun Watson pass complete to Ray-Ray McCloud for 16 yds to the NCaro 23 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: D. Watson pass,to R. McCloud for 16 yds for a 1ST down

videos.description: Deshaun Watson pass complete to Wayne Gallman for 16 yds to the NCaro 1 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: D. Watson pass,to W. Gallman for 16 yds for a 1ST down

videos.description: With six seconds left in the half, Deshaun Watson finds Jordan Leggett from the 1-yard line for the touchdown to put Clemson back up 21-16.
videos.headline: Clemson takes back the lead heading to halftime

videos.description: Marquise Williams pass complete to Mack Hollins for 25 yds to the Clem 16 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: M. Williams pass,to M. Hollins for 25 yds for a 1ST down

videos.description: Marquise Williams's pass is intercepted by Cordrea Tankersley, and Clemson would score on the next drive to go up 28-16.
videos.headline: Clemson picks off UNC

videos.description: Deshaun Watson pass complete to Artavis Scott for a loss of 4 yards to the NCaro 15 for a 1ST down lat. to Wayne Gallman for 26 yds to the NCaro 15 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: D. Watson pass,to A. Scott for -4 yds for a 1ST down,lat. to W. Gallman for 26 yds for a 1ST down

videos.description: Wayne Gallman run for 3 yds for a TD
videos.headline: W. Gallman run for 3 yds for a TD

videos.description: UNC fails to convert on fake punt
videos.headline: UNC fails to convert on fake punt

videos.description: Deshaun Watson pass complete to Artavis Scott for 35 yds for a TD
videos.headline: D. Watson pass,to A. Scott for 35 yds for a TD

videos.description: Wayne Gallman run for 23 yds to the Clem 46 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: W. Gallman run for 23 yds for a 1ST down

videos.description: Deshaun Watson pass intercepted Nazair Jones return for no gain to the Clem 42
videos.headline: D. Watson pass intercepted,N. Jones return  for 0 yds

videos.description: Marquise Williams pass complete to Quinshad Davis for 23 yds to the Clem 3 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: M. Williams pass,to Q. Davis for 23 yds for a 1ST down

videos.description: Marquise Williams run for 1 yd for a TD
videos.headline: M. Williams run for 1 yd for a TD

videos.description: Wayne Gallman run for 31 yds to the NCaro 49 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: W. Gallman run for 31 yds for a 1ST down

videos.description: Deshaun Watson injured on the play
videos.headline: Deshaun Watson injured on the play

videos.description: From the two yard line, Clemson's Deshaun Watson keeps on the read-option and skips into the end zone increasing the Tigers' lead to 42-23.
videos.headline: Watson skips into the end zone, Clemson can smell playoff

videos.description: Marquise Williams pass complete to Quinshad Davis for 40 yds to the Clem 30 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: M. Williams pass,to Q. Davis for 40 yds for a 1ST down

videos.description: Marquise Williams pass complete to Brandon Fritts for 27 yds to the Clem 3 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: M. Williams pass,to B. Fritts for 27 yds for a 1ST down

videos.description: Elijah Hood run for 2 yds for a TD (Nick Weiler KICK)
videos.headline: E. Hood run for 2 yds for a TD, (N. Weiler KICK)

videos.description: Marquise Williams pass complete to Ryan Switzer for 21 yds to the NCaro 42 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: M. Williams pass,to R. Switzer for 21 yds for a 1ST down

videos.description: Marquise Williams sacked by Shaq Lawson for a loss of 10 yards to the Clem 46 Marquise Williams fumbled, forced by Shaq Lawson, recovered by Clem Austin Bryant , return for 0 yards
videos.headline: M. Williams sacked by S. Lawson for -10 yds,M. Williams fumbled, forced by S. Lawson, recovered by Clem A. Bryant

videos.description: Greg Huegel 27 yd FG GOOD
videos.headline: G. Huegel 27 yd FG GOOD

videos.description: Marquise Williams run for 28 yds to the Clem 17 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: M. Williams run for 28 yds for a 1ST down

videos.description: Marquise Williams pass complete to Ryan Switzer for 17 yds for a TD (Nick Weiler KICK)
videos.headline: M. Williams pass,to R. Switzer for 17 yds for a TD, (N. Weiler KICK)

videos.description: Down eight points late, North Carolina covers an onsides-kick, but it gets called back for an offsides penalty that appears to have been the incorrect call.
videos.headline: Controversy reigns at the end of ACC title game

videos.description: Nick Weiler kickoff for 9 yds , C.J. Fuller return for no gain to the NCaro 30 C.J. Fuller fumbled, recovered by Clem
videos.headline: N. Weiler kick for 9 yds,C. Fuller return for 0 yds,C. Fuller fumbled, recovered by Clem

videos.description: Robert Smith joins Scott Van Pelt to break down the controversial ending to the ACC title game, in which UNC was called for offsides after appearing to recover its onside kick in the final minute.
videos.headline: Robert Smith: 'Nobody's offsides'

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Analysis (Robert Smith: 'Nobodies offsides') 2015/12/5 ESHEET SVP SC

videos.description: Check out highlights from Clemson's 45-37 victory over North Carolina.
videos.headline: Clemson's victory in 15 seconds

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Clemson's victory in 15 seconds) 2015/12/05 ESHEET
